condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Effective and efficient management of the PME Programme

description.narrative: UNICEF Lao PDR efficiently mobilized the necessary technical expertise through staff and partnerships to provide strategic and technical advice and guidance to the Ministry of Planning and Investment (incl. the Department for International Cooperation, Centre for Development Policy Research and Lao Statistics Bureau), the National Institute for Economic Research and the National Assembly, and strengthen capacity, engage in partnerships, and effectively and efficiently manage the implementation of the Social Policy, Monitoring and Evaluation programme. This has contributed to the increased capacity for policy and data analysis and the increased availability of data to inform policy, planning and monitoring. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
